Important Articles.headline: IonQ (IONQ) has been selected for the first stage of the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency Quantum Benchmarking Initiative. This program is designed to assess and validate the feasibility of developing industrially useful quantum computers ahead of conventional projections. With a demonstrated track record of innovation and real-world quantum applications, IonQ will help inform industry standards. As a participant in the first stage of DARPA’s QBI, IonQ will play a role in defining what
Important Articles.title: IonQ selected by DARPA for Quantum Benchmarking Intitiative

Important Articles.headline: IonQ (NYSE:IONQ) recently announced a groundbreaking collaboration with Ansys, demonstrating quantum computing's superiority over classical methods in medical device design, which positively impacted the company's stock by 13% over the past week. The announcement highlighted IonQ's technological capabilities, which may have fueled investor interest amid a broader market decline led by tech giants like Tesla and Nvidia. Despite these advancements, the company's stock dropped 7% over the last month, amidst a broader market downturn led by looming tariffs and the Nasdaq's worst monthly performance since 2022. Important Articles.title: IonQ (NYSE:IONQ) Showcases Quantum Computing In Medical Devices While Stock Drops 7% In Last Month

Important Articles.headline: Nvidia's (NVDA) week-long 2025 GTC event is wrapping up on Friday, the conference highlighted by Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang's keynote speech on Tuesday. While quantum computing stocks D-Wave Quantum (QBTS) and Rigetti Computing (RGTI) continue to face stock pressures stemming from Huang's comments at GTC's Quantum Day panels, what lies in store for the future of artificial intelligence and quantum computing technology? Defiance ETFs CEO and CIO Sylvia Jablonski joins rad Smith and Myles Udland to talk more about some of the next catalysts for AI and the practical uses for quantum computing. Catch Yahoo Finance's full interview with D-Wave Quantum CEO Alan Baratz where he discusses the quantum computing company's claims of "quantum supremacy." To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.
Important Articles.title: As Nvidia's GTC wraps up, what's next for AI, quantum computing?

Important Articles.headline: The program will define benchmarks for utility-scale quantum computers and develop a roadmap through 2033.
